m_szDocTitle: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PROCESSING VOICE COMMAND - HYUNDAI MOTOR COMPANY
m_szDocSumamry: Login Sign up Search Expert Search Quick Search Patents/Apps Non-Patent Literature SEARCH RESEARCH MPEP 2.0 TOOLS & RESOURCES ACCLAIM IP HELP Title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PROCESSING VOICE COMMAND United States Patent Application 20120265536 Kind Code: A1 Abstract: Disclosed is a technique for processing voice commands. In particular, the disclose technique increases a voice recognition rate without performing a process of inputting separate voice commands by updating a voice command table based on interaction with a user by storing similar commands input by the user once those commands have
